```{r setup}
library(table1)
library(tidyverse)

# Cleaned & merged data import
full_analysis = readRDS(here::here("data/full_analysis.rds"))
```

# Table 1 - Summary of Analysis Variables

```{r table_one}
# Biological & Demographic Variables
table1(~ hbp1 + hbp2 + sys_bp + dia_bp + age + gender + race + educ +
         smoke + bmi + hdl + ldl + diabetes + egfr_ckdepi + crp +
         is.na(geo_tract11) + is.na(geo_zcta5) + is.na(geo_county5) | study,
       data = full_analysis)
# ICE Variables
table1(~ ICEincome_tract + ICEraceeth_tract + ICEhome_tract + ICEincwb_tract + 
         ICEincwnh_tract + ICElanguage_tract + ICEedu_tract +
         ICEincome_zcta + ICEraceeth_zcta + ICEhome_zcta + ICEincwb_zcta + 
         ICEincwnh_zcta + ICElanguage_zcta + ICEedu_zcta + 
         ICEincome_county + ICEraceeth_county + ICEhome_county + ICEincwb_county +
         ICEincwnh_county + ICElanguage_county + ICEedu_county | study,
       data = full_analysis)
```
